entities.description: Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) code used for geographical classification in the survey.
Number of valid cases used in statistical analysis.
The total number of cases recorded in the survey.
Summary statistics including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation of responses.
Specific location information referring to survey data columns.

relationships.description: Connects the survey with the Metropolitan Statistical Area codes used.
Links the statistical analysis with the number of valid cases considered.
Represents the total number of recorded cases in the survey data.
Relates the survey results to the summarized statistical data.
Indicates where in the data file the specific survey information is located.
